This folder contains my implementations of the key algorithms from Course 1.

## Notebooks

- `01_linear_regression.ipynb`  
  - 1D & multivariate linear regression.  
  - Gradient descent, cost vs iterations.

- `02_logistic_regression.ipynb`  
  - Binary classification with logistic regression.  
  - Decision boundary visualization and metrics.

- `03_regularization_expe.ipynb`  
  - Polynomial regression.  
  - Overfitting vs L2 regularization (Ridge).
